alert.note: Alert for Butler; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 2:25PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Butler, northeastern Monroe and southeastern Wilcox Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 224 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Pine Apple, or 20 miles southeast of Camden, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pine Apple. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
